title: Day 4: Shaun White, Jamie Anderson and her best friend, Julia Mancuso
description: Jamie Anderson and her best friend and fellow gold medalist, Julia Mancuso, discuss their friendship, plus Shaun White shares what it is like to be the “old man” on the slopes, his love of skateboarding and more.
author: tess.quinlan@nbcuni.com (NBC Sports)
content:encoded: Jamie Anderson and her best friend and fellow gold medalist, Julia Mancuso, discuss their friendship, plus Shaun White shares what it is like to be the “old man” on the slopes, his love of skateboarding and more.
